title: Malaysia's IHH plans rival bid for India's Fortis Healthcare - Bloomberg
text:
(Reuters) - Malaysian investment holding company IHH Healthcare Bhd is proposing a rival offer for Fortis Healthcare Ltd, valuing the Indian company at as much as $1.3 billion, Bloomberg reported bloom.bg/2HtCIxX , citing people with knowledge of the matter.
A Fortis hospital building is pictured in New Delhi, India, March 28, 2018. REUTERS/Adnan Abidi/Files Manipal Hospitals Enterprises Private Ltd on Tuesday raised its offer to Fortis Healthcareâ€™s hospital business by about a fifth in an attempt to win over minority shareholders opposed to the deal.
Both IHH and Fortis were not immediately available for comment.
Reporting by Tanvi Mehta in Bengaluru; Editing by Gopakumar Warrier
